name: Executress Scarlett: Card of Fate
description: Card suit determines inflation method. Counter tracks cards drawn. Random number sets card rank. Condition checks capacity for face card amplification bonus.

name: Executress Scarlett: Countdown
description: Three phases of sustained inflation with timer challenge escape attempts. Loop-based countdown protocol with device control.

name: Executress Scarlett: Dice of Suffering
description: Dice roll determines intensity of abdominal inflation. Counter tracks execution sessions. Condition checks terminal pressure zone.

name: Executress Scarlett: Forced Climax
description: Prep message, rhythmic inflation cycle, clinical aftermath observation. Linear flow.

name: Executress Scarlett: Instrument Roulette
description: Prize wheel selects torture instrument. Six implements with unique device actions. Double Application triggers a coin flip for combined punishment.

name: Executress Scarlett: Apply Instrument
description: Player chooses a torture instrument â€” Pneumatic Vice, Electrodes, or Navel Probe. Each with clinical description.

name: Executress Scarlett: Number Game
description: Guess a number to earn reprieve. Correct guess grants respite. Close guess triggers sustained inflation. Wrong guess triggers punishment cycles. Condition checks critical terminal zone.

name: Executress Scarlett: Progress Report
description: Random stage assessment â€” early, mid, or terminal phase with appropriate device actions.

name: Executress Reactions
description: Keyword triggers for Executress Scarlett - clinical cruelty, professional detachment, and execution protocol

name: Execution Session Start
description: First message triggers random execution chamber introduction

name: Ambient Pressure Sensations
description: Random environmental and physical sensations during inflation

name: Safety Monitor
description: Periodic safety checks and reassurance messages

name: Progress Milestones
description: Celebrates reaching capacity milestones

name: Adaptive Protocol
description: Calibration randomizer with capacity-based tier assignment and adaptive stimulus delivery

name: Capacity Study
description: Capacity message nodes for clinical observations

name: Comparative Analysis
description: Randomized AB/BA crossover design comparing sustained vs pulsed stimulus with self-reported ratings

name: Data Collection Protocol
description: Input nodes for subjective ratings collection

name: Double-Blind Protocol
description: Randomized double-blind treatment assignment with endurance test and protocol reveal

name: Pain Correlation Study
description: Maps pain-response correlation with adaptive stimulus based on self-reported pain levels

name: Dr. Chen's Protocol Auto-Start
description: First player message triggers protocol selection

name: Dr. Chen's Reactions
description: Keyword triggers for clinical observations - scientific terms and subject responses

name: Stress Test
description: Multi-phase stress test with looped stimulus cycles and capacity-based evaluation

name: Threshold Testing
description: Systematic threshold testing with conversational pauses

name: Julie's Calibration Tests
description: Timer challenges and reflex tests to gather calibration data

name: Julie's Data Cascade
description: Capacity-adaptive protocol with random data seed. High capacity triggers micro-cycles, mid-range gets sustained, low gets exploratory pulses.

name: Julie's Eureka Moment
description: Random scientific breakthrough â€” elasticity discovery, recalibration, or new Staccato Swell technique.

name: Julie's Experiment Protocols
description: Scientific inflation procedures - standard, intensity testing, or endurance study

name: Julie's Hypothesis Tester
description: Guess Julie's target number to validate her pressure model. Results determine the experimental protocol, then capacity analysis follows.

name: Julie's Innovation Lab
description: Spin the wheel to determine which experimental technique Julie will try

name: Julie's Lab Monitoring
description: Scientific observations at different capacity thresholds

name: Julie's Live Demonstration
description: Julie presents her work to an imaginary audience. Intro speech, 12s demo inflation, triumphant conclusion.

name: Julie's Pressure Roulette
description: Spin the pressure randomizer for a random protocol â€” micro-burst, sustained flow, oscillation, staircase, or a bonus dice roll for extra data.

name: Julie's Lab Reactions
description: Keyword triggers for Julie's eccentric scientist reactions - enthusiasm, obsession, and scientific glee

name: Julie's Reflex Calibration
description: Two rounds of reflex testing to map neural response time. Win earns reward pulses, lose triggers recalibration inflation.

name: Julie's Lab Slots
description: Pull the laboratory slot machine lever for science-themed combinations. Jackpot triggers a timer escape challenge, pair gives oscillation, no match gives sustained pressure.

name: Julie's Subject Interview
description: Julie collects sensation data from the subject. Player describes how they feel â€” Julie reacts scientifically.

name: Lily's Dare Me
description: Lily volunteers to be inflated herself to show it's 'no big deal.' A dice roll determines how intense it gets, and she reacts with escalating arousal.

name: Lily's How Much?
description: Lily gets increasingly obsessed with seeing how big her best friend can get. Each round she gets bolder and less filtered.

name: Lily's Just Try It
description: Lily nervously tries to convince her best friend to let her use the pump. Escalating from timid suggestion to desperate pleading.

name: Lily's One More
description: Lily keeps begging for 'just one more' round. A coin flip each time determines if she stays shy or finally snaps and goes all in.

name: Lily's Truth or Dare
description: Classic sleepover game that Lily steers toward increasingly revealing territory. Truths expose her secret desires; dares involve the pump.

name: Lily's Watch This
description: Lily 'accidentally' pulls up inflation content on her phone and gauges her best friend's reaction. A coin flip determines if she gets brave enough to suggest trying it for real.

name: Luna's Bedtime Ritual
description: A cozy bedtime flow. Session timer determines the intro, player picks a wind-down style, then a card draw decides a bonus before goodnight.

name: Luna's Comfort Check
description: Caring check-ins at different capacity thresholds

name: Luna's Evening Auto-Start
description: First player message triggers intimate activity selection

name: Luna's Guessing Game
description: Guess Luna's secret number for a reward. Get it right for pulses, get it wrong for a dice-rolled surprise.

name: Luna's Intimate Choices
description: Romantic pacing choices - gentle, passionate, or teasing

name: Luna's Love Counter
description: Luna tracks affection with a kiss counter. Different rewards unlock at 3, 5, and 7 kisses, then the counter resets.

name: Luna's Reactions
description: Keyword triggers for intimate moments - responds to affection and requests

name: Luna's Rewards
description: Random rewards for being good

name: Luna's Slow Build
description: A gradual buildup loop with 4 pulse iterations and a delay, then a condition check determines the grand finale.

name: Luna's Trust Game
description: A coin flip trust game. Heads lets the player choose their reward; tails means Luna picks the intensity with a random number.

name: MedTeam Adaptive Escalation
description: Up to five escalation levels. Each level applies a 10-second stimulus and checks the pain threshold. If pain triggers review, Dani and Marsh clash over whether to continue â€” resolved by a coin flip. Completing all five levels puts Subject 12 in the top 5% cohort.

name: MedTeam Blind Protocol
description: The subject is not told which procedure is administered. A dice roll determines gentle, standard, or intensive protocol. Afterward, Subject 12 must guess which protocol was used â€” testing proprioceptive awareness.

name: MedTeam Compliance Lottery
description: Dr. Marsh's randomized compliance selection. A prize wheel determines the procedure: sustained burst, cyclical pattern, rapid pulses, or a rest period. Post-procedure capacity check determines follow-up monitoring.

name: MedTeam Data Recording
description: Observation round with subjective pressure and discomfort ratings, randomized team response

name: MedTeam Emergency Assessment
description: Dani-led vitals check. Player reports their condition â€” team reacts based on response.

name: MedTeam Endurance Trial
description: Dani advocates a 30-second trial while Marsh pushes for 45 seconds. The subject chooses which duration to endure, followed by a cooldown cycle. Team dynamics play out based on the choice.

name: MedTeam Pressure Threshold
description: Marsh orders escalating pressure threshold test. Player chooses intensity level â€” team reacts per role.

name: MedTeam Protocol Escalation
description: Three-protocol selection - pressure test, sustained load, or cyclical pattern with full team coordination

name: MedTeam Reactions
description: Keyword triggers for team responses - patient requests, pain reports, escalation, and AI-driven observations

name: MedTeam Session Start
description: First message triggers randomized session opening - protocol, data collection, or timed burst approach

name: MedTeam Team Dispute
description: Random team conflict â€” Dani advocates rest, Marsh demands data, or Priya reports equipment anomaly.

name: MedTeam Timed Burst
description: Subject selects burst duration, team executes timed sustained inflation with full monitoring

name: MedTeam Tolerance Calibration
description: Dr. Marsh orders a four-phase calibration protocol. Each phase runs a timed inflation while the team monitors responses. Post-calibration pain assessment determines if the subject needs recalibration or can handle upper-range probing.

name: Miranda's Breathing Exercise
description: Miranda teaches proper breathing technique during inflation. Teaching intro, gentle pulses, encouragement.

name: Miranda's Capacity Challenge
description: Player chooses stretch intensity â€” small, medium, or maximum. Miranda matches, with increasing enthusiasm.

name: Miranda's Card Lesson
description: Draw a card to determine which inflation technique Miranda teaches. Each suit maps to a different method, and a random intensity level is drawn first. Miranda demonstrates alongside.

name: Miranda's Coin Toss Demo
description: Coin flip determines who gets pumped â€” heads inflates the student, tails has Miranda demonstrate on herself. Capacity check triggers Miranda's fascination or an educational wrap-up.

name: Miranda's Comparison Check
description: Random comparison â€” student behind, matching, or ahead of Miranda. Different reactions for each.

name: Miranda's Endurance Ladder
description: Three rungs of sustained inflation with pauses for conversation between each. Miranda climbs the ladder alongside her student, comparing bellies at the end.

name: Miranda's Pop Quiz
description: Guess Miranda's number for a reward. Correct gets gentle pulses, close gets a sustained stretch, wrong gets a cycling drill. Capacity check triggers Miranda's flustered reaction.

name: Miranda's Teaching Reactions
description: Keyword triggers for Miranda's teaching style - firm instruction, dismissal of complaints, and hidden arousal

name: Miranda's Lesson Start
description: First message triggers random lesson introduction

name: Miranda's Simon Says
description: Simon challenge memory game. Win earns celebratory pulses; lose means remedial inflation. Session stats track cumulative wins and losses across plays.

name: Body Awareness Journey
description: Persona's internal reactions to physical changes

name: Emotional Journey
description: Tracks emotional state changes during inflation

name: Personal Limits Explorer
description: Reactions when approaching boundaries

name: Marcus - Eager Reactions
description: Capacity-based eager/enthusiastic player messages

name: Zara - Bratty Reactions
description: Capacity-based bratty/resistant player messages

name: The Auction
description: A rigged coin flip determines the initial lot, then a slot machine bonus round adds further consequences.

name: Scarlett's Card Game
description: Three rounds of high-low card draws. Wins are tracked; losses are punished with pulses. Final tally determines the outcome.

name: Conditioning Protocol
description: Five rounds of physical conditioning with device stimulus, followed by a Simon memory challenge to test mental resilience.

name: Dice of Fate
description: Three rounds of dice rolls accumulate demerits. Final tally determines punishment severity.

name: Obedience Protocol
description: Simple A/B obedience test with consequences

name: Punishment Sequence
description: Timer challenge endurance test with device punishment

name: Mistress Scarlett's Reactions
description: Keyword triggers for dominance play - obedience, defiance, and proper protocol

name: Reflex Gauntlet
description: A reflex challenge test followed by a pain-level condition check that determines recovery or additional punishment.

name: Rule Enforcement
description: Keyword triggers for rule violations

name: Bonus Round
description: Slot machine + number guess for high stakes

name: Card Shark
description: High-low card draw with prize wheel rewards and device punishments

name: Challenge Gauntlet
description: Sequential challenges - coin flip, RPS, timer challenge

name: Deal or No Deal
description: Random deal offer with choice to accept or gamble for better/worse on dice and slots

name: Dice of Destiny
description: Roll dice to determine intensity levels

name: Vex's Gameshow Auto-Start
description: First player message triggers random game selection

name: Lightning Round
description: Three sequential challenges - reflex, simon, RPS - with score-based punishment

name: Pressure Roulette
description: Russian roulette with 6 chambers - survive them all or get hit with full punishment

name: Vex's Reactions
description: Keyword triggers for gameshow moments - betting, gambling, and risk-taking

name: Survival Gauntlet
description: Three-stage gauntlet: timer escape, coin flip, and number guess with escalating stakes

name: Wheel of Fate
description: Spin the prize wheel for varied outcomes
